Development continues on #ProductID, our main solution based on #IOTA for the identification of objects and events, fundamental component of many applications such as #supplychain #tracking. Here is a document by our CEO @sdellava the progress:  https://t.co/by6PIJkumv

Platooning is a technology for trucks to drive semiautonomously in a so called platoon. They reduce the distance to one another which leads to improved fuel efficiency & safety. With #IOTA, trucks will be able to compensate each other for the differences in fuel savings. #DLT  https://t.co/HWbHGRFnG8

What is remarkable is the exponential growth, illustrating the growing interest from industrial players. There is also some time lag between starting to consider #IOTA and filing in a patent, so we don't know how much attention is currently being paid.

Great write up on IoT and why it's so much more than IoT. Very much in line with our thoughts at #IOTA. I don't think "Cyber-Physical Edge Computing Enabled Objects" has quite the same ring, but I agree with the sentiment! Great job @Hod_Fleishman.   https://t.co/RXcL8NyRJa
